climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: 🏅【Designed for Comfort】Our cushion is designed to provide comfortable seating for sedentary people, allowing you to focus on your work without discomfort. It's perfect for adults weighing between 100-220 lbs.If for some reason our cushions do not fit your seat, just contact us and we will address your issue within 24 hours.
🏅【Quality Memory Foam】Our cushion is made of durable memory foam that provides superior comfort. It's slow-rebounding and always regains its shape after each use, ensuring long-lasting comfort.

🏅【Relieves Pain and Improves Posture】The ergonomic "W" shape of our cushion provides support and comfort while reducing pressure on your lower back, waist, and hips. It also helps improve your posture, reducing the risk of pain and discomfort.

🏅【Certified Safe Materials】Our cushion is made of high-density memory foam and features a non-slip bottom and breathable black mesh cloth. It has been tested by professional safety organizations to ensure it's safe and comfortable for extended use.

🏅【Versatile and Portable】Our cushion fits most chairs, making it perfect for use as a car seat cushion, desk chair cushion, sciatica pain relief cushion, gaming chair cushion, or chair cushion for back pain. It measures just 19" x 17" x 6". If you're not satisfied, we offer a hassle-free full refund.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Extra-Dense Memory Foam Breathable Mesh fabric Non-slip Bottom Pad Removable and Washable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing alternative to getting a new chair (but you should still get a new chair)
reviews.reviewText: The chair I have in my office is a piece of **** it was fine for a few months and in a year it was incredibly uncomfortable and even painful to sit on. But I got laid off not too long ago so getting a new chair is unfortunately not a priority. So I did some research on sitting pillows and came across this oneAnd wow the difference was immediate.My chair is so bad that sitting on it was doing damage, it was hard to stand up out of it, it would make my butt numb, and my tailbone ache and tingle. Whenever I stood up I had to do that cliche hands on my back stretch to straighten back out to stand upright. My back was hurting in ways it never did before and my neck pain was getting worse, I work from home and other than going to the gym my hobbies also include me being at a desk so I spend a lot of time in the chair (10-15 hours)I got this pillow and gave it a go, 24hours later I felt way better, my back pain started going away, my neck pain dulled to where it’s supposed to be, and I was able to stand up out of my chair again. I love this thing, I very much still need a new chair but for now this is a cheaper alternative that’s working greatIt’s comfortable too which is a bonus, I only have 1 minor complaint and 1 is more of a suggestionMy complaint is the rough mesh material, if you sit on it without pants on it’s really scratchy, so I always feel it’s necessary now to put my shorts on before I sit down. Not sure what id replace it with though since it is pretty durable material.Suggestion: get sticky Velcro strips that you can cut and place on the pillow and your chair, the pillow doesn’t slide around when I’m sitting, but whenever I get up it shifts and sitting back down I have to sort of grab it and adjust while I’m sitting so it’s in the right spot since my chair has the little winglets on the seat edge

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No more car vibration
reviews.reviewText: I purchased two of these for the front seats of my Mercedes C63S. It’s a V-8 with a great ride, but it tends to have a little too much vibration which sports cars are known for. I was hesitant to buy the car because I knew it was going to be an issue for my butt and back, but I really wanted to see if I could fix the problem and still have the car of my dreams! I tried several cushions and they all helped, but this one was the best of all of them. It’s a great shock absorber and very comfortable to sit on. I purchased the larger size and it fits the car seat well. It doesn’t slip around or twist when I get in and out of the car. I got 2 because sometimes, I’m the passenger as my husband loves to drive the car too! I’m very happy with the quality of the cushion and would recommend it to anyone who has coccyx and back pain and can’t take the vibration of a car. I hope this review helps others looking for a solution for comfort in a car - try it, it works!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Office Girlies Listen Up!!
reviews.reviewText: I received a new pillow today and put it on my mesh office chair. At first glance, I liked its shape. However, two things immediately caught my attention. Firstly, the pillow is quite big for my backside, but it compresses significantly once you sit on it. Secondly, it is not very firm, but it does have a nice cushioning effect of about 1 inch once sat on. It is less firm than a medical pillow. I will keep you all updated on my experience using it at work over the next week or so, and share my conclusion. As of now, I think it would be better to look for something that provides more firmness and cushioning if you want real support.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best For Less
reviews.reviewText: After working for 33 years and probably bought about 10 pillows--I must say without thinking about it that this is the BEST office chair pillow that I have ever invested in. Its firm enough to keep its shape; but feels cushiony when you have sit on it for long periods and is still comfortable after a full work day. It has a hole in the pillow just in the center in the place where you need it for air flow. It has a little tab a lower back that adds another bit of comfort that I have not seen in other pillows. I don't mind giving critical reviews for improvement...and I love giving great reviews when I believe that they are warranted. I know its just a pillow but its a happy positive game changer for me. 100% Will be buying more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks like the ad
reviews.reviewText: Have no dislikes. It looks exactly as the picture. Very comfortable and husband who has a back problem found it to be very therapeutic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars **UPDATED** Holds It Shape Now - Still Not Thick Enough
reviews.reviewText: I was pretty excited when this arrived, and it was at such a good price. I sit 10 to 12 hours a day for work and my bottom was getting very sore. I thought this may do the trick. Within the first 2 days the cushion had permanently flattened to about 2 inches thick and it does not come back to full thickness. It has a very good non-slip backing, which I do like. I am returning because it is no better or worse than sitting on my thinly padded game chair that I use for an office chair. I guess the search continues.----> UPDATE<---- So, the company reached out to me and addressed my issue REALLY FAST and their CUSTOMER SERVICE IS 5 STAR! They replaced my cushion with an updated model that is slightly thicker, but not thick enough for 12 hour workday sitting for me. With that said, the material is very nice and stays very cool. I do not get hot sitting on the material. The non-slip bottom is the best I have ever seen. The dimensions are perfect and the cushion completely covers the seat of my chair. The cushion does return to it's original shape after sitting all night and in the morning until about 1pm or 2pm it does its job. That is the first 6 hours of my day. The last 6 hours of my day I need to put a pillow on top of it. I think with a little improvement, this product can be the best on the market.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’m real old. I sit too much. One day my ass couldn’t take the pain anymore. It was either stand up watching TV, or try one of these cushions. I went with the latter. The result was complete relief…almost immediately. The cushion is thick, and has a cutout for the tailbone, the real sore spot. I bought 3 of these. One cushion eliminated the need to replace a chair whose seat sank to a new low. I have tried gel seats, but none of them came close to the relief from this product.

Product is not only an excellent price but of great quality. It does not slide around on the chair and the product dimensions in the description are accurate so you can size it to your chair.I was experiencing tail bone pain from my chair after an injury and bought this to see if a cheap cushion would resolve the issue before I opted to buy a more expensive one. I will not be buying a more expensive cushion as this one is all I could ask for.TLDR: Comfy, relief for pain, great price

reviews.reviewTitle: Benazcap Coussin Siège de Chaise de Bureau en Mousse à Mémoire de Forme...
reviews.reviewText: Il est arrivé à temps. Il est très confortable et tout simplement génial. Je le recommande vivement.

Aufgrund starker Schmerzen im LWS-Bereich ( Bandscheibenvorfall und Piriformissyndrom), wurde dieses Sitzkissen bestellt, um die Schreibtischarbeit halbwegs erträglich zu machen.Vorteil: Das Sitzkissen entlastet spürbar. VIELEN DANK!Der Verkäufer ( mit dem ich kommunizierte) ist sehr freundlich und sehr bemüht, was sich unter anderem darin zeigt, dass überlegt wird bei der zukünftigen Produktion des Kissens eventuell auch eine Halterung anzubringen, so dass das Kissen mit dem jeweiligen Sessel verbunden werden kann ( zb durch Anbinden) und bei Wechsel der Sitzposition nicht mehr verrutschen kann.Jedenfalls ist das Sitzkissen (auch so) vom Sitzkomfort her 1A, und bringt für meine lädierte Lendenwirbelsäule eine große Erleichterung! Man sitzt wie auf Watte gebettet, sehr sehr angenehm und hat das Gefühl die Schmerzen seien wie weggeblasen!Möchte es von daher nicht mehr missen und wird nicht mein letztes Kissen dieser Art gewesen sein!Klare Kaufempfehlung!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Having only used the Benazcap Memory Seat Cushion for a day it is difficult to make long term judgement on this cushion, however, it is firm and comfortable and assists me when getting up from the sofa and helps my joint conditions when using on my computer chair. The reviews were good and prompted my choice of this cushion, My only disappointment is that I had planned to purchase 2 additional cushions if they met my requirements but on visiting the websitetdoday I find the price has increased dramatically in 3 days and this additional cost is prohibitive and will prevent me from making further purchases at this point in time. However, I would recommend this product and supplier to my friends.
L'ho preso per l'ufficio. Notevole confort per tutto il giorno. Prende la forma e sostiene senza punti di pressione. La mia sciatica ringrazia. +++
